![description]
# About
This bot allows you to create a boss kill timer. When the timer expires, the bot will write you a reminder in the chat and after 5 minutes will start a new timer with the same timer_id

# Functional
1. ```/start``` - Start bot in chat

2. ```/help``` - list of commands

4. ```/info``` - get information about the bot

5. ```/bosses``` - list of bosses (you can copy his name by tap)

6. ```/set <boss-name> <time_of_killing>``` - set timer

7. ```/get <count?>``` - get information about nearest <count> timers in chat (if count wasn't passed, info will be about all timers)

8. ```/get_my <count?>``` - get information about personal nearest <count> timers in chat (if count wasn't passed, info will be about all personal timers)

9. ```/delete <timer_id>``` - delete timer by id (you can copy id by tap)

10. ```/delete_all_timers``` - delete all timers in chat

# How to use
1. Add [my bot](https://t.me/lineage2m_respawn_bot) to chat
2. Run the ```/start``` command once
3. Use it!

Thats all! Now you can use the bot, congratulations ðŸŽ‰
